languages.text: Кроме боевых орудий в бою вы можете использовать способности постов, которые занимают офицеры на корабле. Повышайте уровень корабля, чтобы открыть доступ к новым способностям. На один {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}пост{/g} можно назначить две обычные способности и одну особую способность.

On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.
languages.original_text: Кроме боевых орудий в бою вы можете использовать способности постов, которые занимают офицеры на корабле. Повышайте уровень корабля, чтобы открыть доступ к новым способностям. На один {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}пост{/g} можно назначить две обычные способности и одну особую способность.

traits.locale_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using abilities of posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using abilities of posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using abilities from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each post can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

languages.text: Además de disparar armas, el combate entre naves involucra el uso de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de los distintos puestos de la nave ocupados por tus oficiales de confianza. Aumenta el nivel de tu nave para acceder a nuevas capacidades. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} puede tener asignadas hasta dos capacidades básicas y una capacidad definitiva.
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

traits.locale_text: Además de disparar armas, el combate entre naves involucra el uso de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de los distintos puestos de la nave ocupados por tus oficiales de confianza. Aumenta el nivel de tu nave para acceder a nuevas capacidades. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} puede tener asignadas hasta dos capacidades básicas y una capacidad definitiva.

languages.text: 船での戦闘では、武器を撃つだけでなく、信頼できる士官が占拠しているさまざまな船のポストの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使う必要がある。船のレベルを上げることで、新しいアビリティを手に入れることができる。各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}には基本アビリティを最大ふたつ、究極アビリティをひとつ割り当てることができる。
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

traits.locale_text: 船での戦闘では、武器を撃つだけでなく、信頼できる士官が占拠しているさまざまな船のポストの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使う必要がある。船のレベルを上げると、新しいアビリティを手に入れることができる。各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}には基本アビリティを最大ふたつ、究極アビリティをひとつ割り当てることができる。

languages.text: 在太空战斗中，除了使用各种武器开火之外，您还可以发动各个岗位的负责军官的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。舰船升级之后，可以解锁新的能力。每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}最多可以分配两个基础能力与一个终极能力。
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

traits.locale_text: 在太空战斗中，除了使用各种武器开火之外，您还可以发动各个岗位的负责军官的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。舰船升级之后，可以解锁新的能力。每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}最多可以分配两个基础能力与一个终极能力。

languages.text: Im Schiffskampf musst du nicht nur Waffen abfeuern, sondern auch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} von verschiedenen Schiffsposten einsetzen, die von deinen treuen Offizieren besetzt sind. Steigere die Stufe deines Schiffes, um Zugang zu neuen Fähigkeiten zu erhalten. Jedem {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} können bis zu zwei Grundfähigkeiten und eine ultimative Fähigkeit zugewiesen werden.
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

traits.locale_text: Im Schiffskampf musst du nicht nur Waffen abfeuern, sondern auch {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} von verschiedenen Schiffsposten einsetzen, die von deinen treuen Offizieren besetzt sind. Steigere die Stufe deines Schiffes, um Zugang zu neuen Fähigkeiten zu erhalten. Jedem {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} können bis zu zwei Grundfähigkeiten und eine ultimative Fähigkeit zugewiesen werden.

languages.text: En plus des armes, les combats entre vaisseaux impliquent l'utilisation de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} à partir de différents postes occupés par vos fidèles officiers. Augmentez le niveau de votre vaisseau pour accéder à de nouvelles capacités. Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut se voir attribuer jusqu'à deux capacités de base et une capacité ultime.
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.

traits.locale_text: En plus des armes, les combats entre vaisseaux impliquent l'utilisation de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} à partir de différents postes occupés par vos fidèles officiers. Augmentez le niveau de votre vaisseau pour accéder à de nouvelles capacités. Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut se voir attribuer jusqu'à deux capacités de base et une capacité ultime.

languages.text: Gemi çatışmasında silahlarını ateşlemenin yanı sıra güvendiğin subaylarının hâkimiyetindeki mevkilerden {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} de kullanabilirsin. Yeni kabiliyetlere erişim kazanmak için geminin seviyesini artır. Her bir {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}mevkiye{/g} en fazla iki temel kabiliyet ve bir de üstün kabiliyet atanabilir.
languages.original_text: On top of firing weapons, ship combat involves using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} from various ship posts occupied by your trusted officers. Increase your ship's level to gain access to new abilities. Each {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}post{/g} can have up to two basic abilities and one ultimate ability assigned to it.
